job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: ltpgtwere hiring for a rapidly growing series a startup who are developing an autonomous vehicle using shared autonomy the companys platform combines robotics computer vision and machine learning and its here to revolutionize their billion marketltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgttheyre looking for a machine learning engineer to design and deliver their new autonomous vehicleltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtif you are passionate about cutting edge machine learning robotics and having realworld impact this could be the place for youltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtyou willltpgtltulgtltligtdesign and train neural networksltligtltligtdesign train and verify robust machine learning systemsltligtltligtprovide technical leadershipltligtltligtwrite maintainable code design software and deploy machine learning modelsltligtltligtcollaborate with other members of the teamltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtyou haveltpgtltulgtltligtphd or masters degree in computer science or related fieldltligtltligtexperience in reinforcement learning machine learning or optimization theoryltligtltligt years of handson experienceltligtltligtexpertise with deep learning frameworks pytorch tensorflow kerasltligtltligtexperience developing machine learning systemsltligtltligtexpertise in python and cltligtltligtexcellent communication skillsltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltemgtbig cloud is acting as a vendor to this position which is a direct hireltemgtltpgt
